name: Ledge Jumping Combo
author: Mr. Z
info: A ledge jumping script like Beefster's, but shorter and easier to use.Instead of using FFC's to jump from a ledge, this piece of script allows you to use script specific combos instead.Just approach a ledge and Link will automatically jump and keep falling until he reaches a combo that is not a ledge. This script also allows you to fall between screens without stopping.

setup: Import LedgeJumping.z to your Global Active script.After that you only need to place combos of the type Script 1 (number 142) where you need them and you're good to make some craters. (figuratively)
